channel.title: Change price sells back
channel.description: Hi, i was wondering how would u change the price of the item when you sell if to the shop. so if i bought something from 50m it sells for 30m but i want it to sell for same price 50m.

item.title: Change price sells back
item.dc:creator: @bluescap3 bluescap3
item.description:
@bluescap3 wrote:

ok in your server file go to Config then go to item.cfc

search for the item name or id you wish you change stats of

EG:

item = 2677	Attack_cape	Its a Attack_cape	99000	99000	99000	0	0	0	0	0	9	9	9	9	9	0	0

ok now see the 99000

that is the price of the item item so change them and the amount should change to

post back if u have any errors

Read full topic
